James Bate (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Bate_(actor) 0 James Bate (10 April 1945 — 19 May 1992) was a British actor of television, film and stage, who was best known for playing David Allman in the ITV crime thriller series Sleuth. James_Bate ( 10_April_1945 — 19_May_1992 ) was a_British_actor of television_,_film_and_stage , who was_best_known for playing David_Allman in the_ITV_crime_thriller_series_Sleuth .
